News.Title: Phantom Digital Effects Acquires Tippett Studio
News.Summary: Phantom Digital Effects has completed the acquisition of Tippett Studio. This acquisition is expected to boost PhantomFX's performance starting from the second quarter of the fiscal year 2025-26.

News.Title: Phantom Digital Effects Ltd: Small-Cap SME Announces ₹140 Crore Fundraising Plan
News.Summary: Phantom Digital Effects Ltd plans to raise ₹140 crore through a combination of Qualified Institutional Placement (QIP) and preferential issue. The company will raise up to ₹80 crore via QIP and ₹59.95 crore through preferential issue of warrants at ₹247 per warrant. The preferential issue includes allotments to both promoter and public investors, including marquee fund houses.

News.Title: Phantom Digital Effects Raises ₹139.95 Crore Through QIP and Preferential Issue
News.Summary: Phantom Digital Effects, a company with a market capitalization of ₹3.2 billion, has successfully raised ₹139.95 crore through a Qualified Institutional Placement (QIP) and preferential issue. The funds are intended to support the company's global expansion plans and integration of artificial intelligence technologies.

News.Title: Phantom Digital Effects Secures Contracts Worth 270 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Phantom Digital Effects, a company in the digital effects industry, has announced that it has been awarded contracts valued at 270 million rupees. This news indicates a significant business development for the company, potentially boosting its revenue and market position.

News.Title: Phantom Digital Effects Secures Contracts Worth 270 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Phantom Digital Effects has announced that it has secured new contracts valued at 270 million rupees. This development represents a significant business achievement for the company, potentially boosting its revenue and market position in the digital effects industry.
